title: Artisan Infrastructure Ranked in the 2015 Talkin' Cloud 100 for Accelerated Adoption of Cloud Infrastructure and Solutions
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 5:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Artisan Infrastructure 
AUSTIN, TX -- (Marketwired) -- 09/08/15 -- Artisan Infrastructure , the leading innovator of cloud infrastructure, cloud management and business continuity solutions, today announced that the company has been named to the 2015 Talkin' Cloud 100 list of the World's Top Cloud Computing Companies. The company has earned the position of 61 in the annual review, which is based on data from Talkin' Cloud's online survey, conducted in 2015. This recognition follows a series of wins and successes for Artisan Infrastructure this year -- including recently being named to the 2015 Inc. 500 list of America's Fastest Growing Companies , 2015 CRN Channel Chief Awards and 2015 Talkin' Cloud Top 7 Cloud Service Providers in the Southwest . 
The Talkin' Cloud 100 ranks top cloud computing vendors based on data from public documents and survey information, including annual and recurring revenue growth in actual dollars and percentage growth rates. Ratings are based on an internal formula that puts a heavy weighting on recurring cloud revenues. 
"Our momentum started in 2014 with the acquisition of Neverfail, a leader in Business Continuity Management (BCM) software. Neverfail, gave us a world-class software development team and strengthened our global operations with 24/7 support coverage," said Brian Hierholzer, Head Cloud Craftsman and CEO of Artisan Infrastructure. "The acquisition allowed us to implement new initiatives with our ecosystem of strategic partners. These initiatives are enabling a wide range of solutions and expanding our wholesale-only cloud services, cloud management, and business continuity offerings. We are pleased to be recognized by Talkin' Cloud for this success, which is a tribute to our technology and the team behind it." 
The Talkin' Cloud 100 represents an elite group of global cloud service providers that generated more than $30 billion in cloud services revenue in 2015 -- an increase of 28.6 percent over last year. Artisan Infrastructure has again joined this competitive list of companies. Over the past three years, the Company has grown its organization significantly, achieving 1,433% growth and adding 82 jobs to the economy. 
"This year's edition of the TC 100 underscores the flexibility and agility of cloud companies as they help give shape to the rapidly expanding market," said Nicole Henderson, Talkin' Cloud Editor-in-Chief. "We congratulate all of this year's exceptional honorees." 
Talkin' Cloud is a publication produced by Penton Media and is a go-to resource for CSPs, VARs and MSPs profiting from cloud computing. Talkin' Cloud features a daily blog, research, Channel Expert Hour Webcasts and FastChat videos. It is the first online media destination for channel partners working in the cloud. Complete results of the 2015 Talkin' Cloud 100 can be found at http://talkincloud.com/tc100 . 
About the Talkin' Cloud 100 Talkin' Cloud 100 ranks the world's top cloud service providers, aggregators, brokers and more. The TC 100 underscores the flexibility and agility of cloud companies as they help give shape to the rapidly expanding market. Companies on the Talkin' Cloud 100 are ranked based on an internal formula that puts a heavy weighting on recurring cloud revenues. Information about metrics used to calculate results comes from surveys of cloud companies and research on the cloud revenues of publicly held companies both from public documents and other methods. For more information on Talkin' Cloud 100, visit http://talkincloud.com/tc100 . 
About Artisan Infrastructure Artisan Infrastructure is the leading innovator of cloud infrastructure, cloud management and business continuity solutions that enable solution providers and enterprises to migrate, manage and deliver continuously available cloud applications at the speed of business. Artisan serves managed service providers, global systems integrators, communications providers, telco's, data centers, independent software vendors and enterprises exclusively through the channel. The company is headquartered in Austin, Texas with offices in Chicago, Denver, Kansas City, Portland, Edinburgh, Scotland and Cluj, Romania. Artisan operates data centers in the United States and Europe.
